list.name: Default
list.comment: renamed a couple methods to be more readable. fixed the dragonfly

task.summary: it finally works! physics engine updated, and now the player moves around as expected, with correct hit detection

overhaul of the panels classes - no more weird rectangles and mouselisteners. they all use swing buttons and labels. fewer lines of code, fewer pictures, more fun (all except the instructions - thats a TODO)
eliminated the need for those weird listener interfaces - completely gone! strange bug with hit detection persists, however. to be fixed soon
got rid of Panel superclass. it wasn't doing anything anyway
